metadata.title: CVE-2023-3161 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in the Framebuffer Console (fbcon) in the Linux Kernel.When providing font->width and font->height greater than 32 tofbcon_set_font, since there are no checks in place, a shift-out-of-boundsoccurs leading to undefined behavior and possible denial of service.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
